message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I can do $10500, which is a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10250, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
